description:
Adventure of Nebulandia is a TV special of the One Piece anime.
The special has the Straw Hat Pirates fight Foxy again in the New World, on Mushroom Island. This soon gives way to a battle against the Marines on an island called Nebulandia that can nullify Devil Fruit powers.

titles.title: ワンピース ~アドベンチャー オブ ネブランディア~
